charaepi_ch0286_00_svboy/2301_1101_0100_:
[Name:PlayerNickname ] was walking through
town when a voice called out to [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="him" F="her" ] from behind.
charaepi_ch0286_00_svboy/2301_1201_0300_:
I was just taking a look around town. The weather
sure is great today, isn’t it?
charaepi_ch0286_00_svboy/2301_1201_0400_:
Weather this good makes me want to go on a
picnic! Right, Miraidon?
charaepi_ch0286_00_svboy/2301_1201_0500_:
Hm? What’s the matter? Oh, are you curious
about Miraidon?
charaepi_ch0286_00_svboy/2301_0401_0700_:
I had a feeling! Any Pokémon Trainer would be
curious about Miraidon!
charaepi_ch0286_00_svboy/2301_0402_0900_:
Yeah, for a Pokémon, Miraidon is a little unique.
No, make that VERY unique.
charaepi_ch0286_00_svboy/2301_1201_1100_:
It’s a Pokémon said to have lived alongside people
in the Paldea region since ancient times.
charaepi_ch0286_00_svboy/2301_1201_1200_:
But Miraidon might actually be a future form of
Cyclizar!
charaepi_ch0286_00_svboy/2301_0401_1400_:
That’s right! But it’s not quite the same as
Evolution!
charaepi_ch0286_00_svboy/2301_0402_1600_: Nope! It’s not Evolution—it’s a future form!
charaepi_ch0286_00_svboy/2301_1201_1700_:
It’s been hypothesized that in the distant future, 
Cyclizar will come to look like Miraidon.
charaepi_ch0286_00_svboy/2301_1201_1800_:
Sometimes Pokémon of the same species can look
different depending on the region they’re from, but
it seems Miraidon’s case is something different.
charaepi_ch0286_00_svboy/2301_1201_1900_:
There’s still no concrete evidence, though, so it 
remains strictly speculation.
charaepi_ch0286_00_svboy/2301_1201_2000_:
But if it really is true, I wonder if its appearance
changed slowly over a long period of time.
charaepi_ch0286_00_svboy/2301_1201_2100_: Or maybe it changed suddenly, like with Evolution?
charaepi_ch0286_00_svboy/2301_1201_2200_:
Don’t you get excited just thinking about it?
Pokémon really are mysterious!
charaepi_ch0286_00_svboy/2301_1201_2300_: But when I think about it...
charaepi_ch0286_00_svboy/2301_1201_2400_:
I guess it’s just as mysterious as me being in this
world right now.
charaepi_ch0286_00_svboy/2301_1201_2500_:
I’ve managed to come to such a wonderful place,
so I plan on using the opportunity to learn a lot!
charaepi_ch0286_00_svboy/2301_1201_2600_:
Well, at any rate, every day since coming to Pasio
has been a blast!
charaepi_ch0286_00_svboy/2301_1201_2700_:
I also feel like I’ve gotten closer to Miraidon after
experiencing something similar to what it did.
charaepi_ch0286_00_svboy/2301_1201_2800_:
And so... I hope you keep being a great friend to 
me and Miraidon!
